text: Peter Mof(f)at(t) or Moffett may refer to: * Peter Moffat, English playwright and screenwriter * Peter Moffatt (1922 – 2007), English television director * Peter Davison, real name Peter Moffett, (born 1951), British actor * Peter Moffett (drummer), for the bands Government Issue and Wool
title: Peter Moffett
